entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Matane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mont-Joli Airport 10:19 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -6.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with a few flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 late this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
